packagegui.title: Services: mDNS-Repeater
packagegui.name: mdns-repeater

field.description: Enable mDNS Repeater Bonjour/Zeroconf packet forwarding.

Select the interfaces that mDNS packets will be forwarded (re-broadcast) across.
Any mDFNS discovery packets received on any of the listed interfaces, will be automatically passed to the other listed interfaces, and any replies will also be passed back to all listed interfaces (including the original interface).
